recipe.title: Berry Medley Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; soy milk, or other milk substitute ; (120 mL)

steps.step: Add tofu and maple syrup to a mixing bowl and whisk together until smooth and no large lumps are present.
Transfer tofu mixture to ice tray and use a rubber spatula to evenly spread the mixture into each of the cube slots.
Place blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, 4 tofu cubes, and milk in a blender, making sure that the cubes sit on top of the fruit.
